author: ESPNcricinfo staff
title: Brendan Taylor rues Covid-19's impact on Zimbabwe cricket
description: Before the pandemic struck, the team had had a packed international calendar to look forward to, for once | ESPNcricinfo.com
content: They don't play anywhere near as frequently as most of their Full Member counterparts do, but 2020 was supposed to be different for Zimbabwe. They began the year with a home Test series against Sri Lanka, followed that with a full tour of Bangladesh, and were… [+2223 chars]
